item.description:
Join us for dinner at Rock Bottom Brewery in the Theatre District, followed by a comedy show at Nick's Comedy Stop. Rock Bottom Brewery has really good food and reasonable prices. Nick's is located at 100 Warrenton Street - just a short walk from the restaurant.

We have free admission at Nick's (tix are usually $20 each). We will be meeting for dinner at 6:30. Doors open at Nick's at 8pm- show starts at 8:30. We should be there early to get good seats. If you just want to join us for the comedy show and not dinner, please specify that in your RSVP. The reservation at Nick's is under the name Catherine. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.

Comedy is always a fun time and free tix are even better, so come join us for a fun night!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Free Tix for Nick's Comedy Stop, Boston and Dinner at Rock Bottom Brewery
